title: [1.12.2~1.7.2][SSP/SMP][永久更新][原生中文]Dragon Mounts2-龙骑士2
author: 企业123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 企业123 于 2020-1-17 22:57 编辑 
此mod在1.10.2以后由另外的作者接手更新，增加大量新内容教程https://www.bilibili.com/video/av13880446
此教程试用于r46版本
图片欣赏






英文更新记录

r46:
Fixed a NullPointerException in EntityAIDragonCatchOwner.

r45:
Dragons will fly together with their owners that glide with Elytras.Forest dragon now produce green grass again and improved performance of the footstep algorithm.
r44:
Added custom dragon egg block, which has variants for each dragon breed and is also selectable from the creative inventory (the vanilla dragon egg block behaves like an "Ender" breed egg).Reworked dragon entity movement code to fix some oddities when flying.Flying dragons now use proper A* pathfinding like on ground.Improved dragon controls, which are now more intuitive and consistent when switching between flying and walking.Removed dragon control keys R and F. Players can now control the dragon with the normal movement keys.The carrot on a stick no longer has any effect on the dragon flight controls.Forest dragons now also leave a trail of mushrooms on dirt and flowers on grass.Dragons no longer follow their owner in close range. Instead, they try to stay in a larger area around their owners unless they're leashed.Removed broken "global" chat command parameter (commands still are global when issued from the server console)."/dragon tame" now accepts an optional parameter to set the name of the new owner.Fixed baby dragons not being classified as children by Minecraft correctly and being saddleable and ridable as a result.Fixed compatibility issues with JourneyMap and other mods that use the entity renderer during initialization. (#22)Fixed compatibility issues with Orespawn and Elysium by adding an option to the config to disable vanilla dragon egg interaction. (#7)Fixed some dragon sounds played with the incorrect pitch and/or volume
r43:
Fixed wrong server proxy class path, which caused a crash on dedicated servers.Fixed dragon age not loaded correctly from NBT.Fixed issues with Polish and Korean translations.Added French translation (thanks to Kenairod!)Added Chinese translation (thanks to zqh!)Dragons no longer try to catch their owner while on a leash. (thanks to TerrorBite!)Slightly reduced dragon collision box size.
r42: Special thanks to TheGreyGhost for the help to port the code to 1.8!
Added Italian translation (thanks to Zekromaster!) 
Adding French-Canadian translation (thanks to DragonsLover!) 
Added Brazilian translation (thanks to Al!) 
Added chat command auto-complete support (thanks to SteveKunG!) 
Fixed incorrect landing AI, causing dragons to fly to the wrong coordinates. 


r41: 
Added Korean translation (thanks to TeamMMKP!) 
Fixed a potential memory leak in the packet handler.


r40: 
Added Turkish translation (thanks to mineturk!) 
Added breed textures for the eggs. 
Fixed a UUID bug when setting and checking the owner of a dragon, causing the dragon to be unresponsive for some commands. 
Fixed some bounding box anomalies (eggs floating below ground, sudden teleports, etc.). 
Improved compatibility with iChun's Morph mod.



注意！！！
这个mod仍在测试阶段，有许多已知和未知的bug，如果此mod使你的龙蛋消失，本搬运工和作者不负责！
原帖并没有写明bug，如发现bug，请向我汇报
MC1.8r42版本需要Forge11.14.3.1473
MC1.8r42（包括r42之后）版本与之前版本不同，需要特定的生态群系才能孵化相应的龙，希望有人可以帮忙做一个教程（有时间我也会自己自己做的）
回复有能提升等级又能让更多人看到帖子造福你我，何乐不为呢{:10_492:}
本帖回收各种金粒人气（注：给楼主人气不扣除自身人气，亲测哦{:10_512:}）
请不要在问虚空龙是什么了，自己在地狱孵孵看

已知bug

r46的兼容问题:r46与很多mod造成冲突，可以下载旧版的r45解决
r42的汉化问题：以太龙的名字不显示中文
r42严重bug：孵化完龙后重启游戏会重新变成龙蛋

兼容

r42版本的特有的固生物群系才能孵化相应的龙的功能：有些龙不支持Biomes O’ Plenty Mod的生物群系
有些龙驯服后与它互动会显示"这条龙不遵循你的命令"，帖子后面的常见问题有解决方案

已经实现的内容
鬼龙发光森林龙种草龙能跟主人(用鞘翅)一起滑翔(仅限mc1.9的Dragon Mountsmod)加入龙息

Dragon Mounts-龙骑士 附属mod推荐
动态光源[1.9.4~1.7.2]这个不是龙骑士的附属mod，但它应该能实现鬼龙动态光源的功能，推荐下载：
[传送门]
血量显示[1.8~1.7.2]这个同样也不是龙骑士的附属mod，但它可以很方便的显示龙蛋的品种，推荐下载：
[传送门]
小龙女[1.7.10]同是littleMaidMob-女仆 的附属mod的小龙女mod，尊重搬运工，请到女仆mod搬运贴下载：
[传送门]
其实我想要一个末影/安德龙能运输生物，虚空龙能释放恶魂炸弹，以太龙速度加快，鬼龙能召唤骷髅打军的打怪，火龙能喷火，水龙能喷水能游泳，冰龙有攻击力加成能像突变生物mod的突变雪傀儡投掷冰块，冻住20格半径内的生物/怪物的附属mod，可惜我不会java，希望会java的大神路过做了==
常见问题
 
Q:会不会添加龙的盔甲？
A:不明确。可能会添加。

Q:龙需要喷火。什么时候做？
A:未来可能添加。(已添加)

Q:我该怎么获得龙蛋？
A: 你可以给两只龙为鱼让它们♂，然后下蛋。如果不行，请在你的config目录下找到DragonMounts.cfg文件，找到"B:eggsInChests=false" 这句，将"B:eggsInChests=false" 改为"B:eggsInChests=true"。想直接获得龙蛋，请在作弊模式开启的情况下按t收入"/give dragon_egg"。
Q:我在单人模式时驯服龙想与龙互动却提示"这条龙不遵循你的命令"，解决方案是？
A:这可能是个未解决的bug。解决方案:在作弊模式开启的情况下按t输入"/dragon tame"取消龙的驯服，然后再驯服一次==

Q: I'm a huge fan of ! Can you add for me?(英文水平有限，无法翻译)
A: This mod is supposed to be fandom-neutral so it's suitable for everyone. This also ensures consistency with Minecraft's look-and-feel. Therefore, I can't fulfill these special requests, sorry.
However, there are some WIP projects that may use the source code of this mod as a base for a fandom-based mod. Here are some examples:
How To Train Your DragonInheritance Cycle / Shur'tugal

能骑着龙！好帅的感觉，下载来研究下，先留爪，谢谢楼主分享
我可以向你透露一下我研究r42研究出的孵化方法：
末影/安德龙在平原，末地孵化；
虚空龙在地狱孵化；
以太龙在高于云层的地方孵化；
鬼龙在不见光的环境下孵化；
火龙在沙漠孵化；
水龙的孵化方法未知；
森林龙在丛林孵化；
冰龙在冰刺之地/雪原孵化；
望你能玩的开心{:10_521:}
